segments.text: I can't believe how careless the woman is right now, lost in dishwashing while chaos brews around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being outright mischievous, sneaking cookies on the verge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it might topple any second; it’s infuriating to watch!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the puddle widening beneath the woman's feet while she just stands there, blissfully unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see the mess that’s unfolding right in front of her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s face is a mix of determination and excitement; I can almost feel his adrenaline.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, she’s so patient, probably thinking about that sweet cookie she wants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s tough to watch this hazardous scene play out knowing it could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would just turn around and take a look.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But for now, she seems content with her chore, completely missing the impending accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
